## CCSelectorState.placeInputSelection property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Places the cursor (more specifically the start and end indices of the text selection) within the phone number input element according to the `inputSelection` state variable.

**Signature:**

```typescript
placeInputSelection: () => void;
```
